name: Global Movie Genre Preferences
tagline: D3 Visualization of the Movie Genre accross continents data
body:
# Hello There.
I created this visualization as a part of my Human Computer Interaction class at the University of Iowa.
It takes the movie viewing preferences dataset and draws a parallel coordinate plot based on the data.
Here's the [link](http://homepage.cs.uiowa.edu/~jparchure/GA2/) to the hosted web page.
Feel free to explore on your own.
Some gentle nudges-
* Click the y-axis of the bar chart
* Click the axes of the PCP, click them individually or in a pair.
* Click the lines of the the Parallel Coordinate Plot, again individually or in pair.

Have fun!


Thanks to the Department of Computer Science, University of Iowa for the webspace

J
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
